revised_title: On the Propagation of Disturbances in Fluids Under Gravity
tldr: The author investigates the propagation of disturbances in fluids under gravity, focusing on the convergence and behavior of wavefronts in both incompressible and compressible fluids. The study reveals that instantaneity of propagation is a result of the fluid being considered incompressible and that the presence of discontinuities in the initial conditions can lead to the formation of wavefronts.
